name: Bloodway Infinity
description:
A two-dimensional shooting game with a top view, which takes place in New York. You will play as a secret agent who is searching with his team for a secret elixir that allows you to gain immortality. In the game you will find a well-drawn pixel graphics, made in a retro style, a crowd of enemies, eager for your death and your gun.

The game is incredibly difficult and requires a lot of effort to complete the passage, and for good reason - because if you suddenly lose, you will have to start the whole level over again.

Features of this game:

  • A well-developed story that you will get to know on more than 8 levels.
  • Try a large number of weapons. It has everything from assault rifles to tire iron and knives.
  • A great, fast and powerful soundtrack consisting of more than 33 tracks from 3 different artists.
  • Detailed character animations consisting of several frames.
  • Each level can be completed in a completely different way.
  • The game has a stealth system.
  • An unusual story with unexpected twists that will complement the gameplay.
